question: Panchayati Raj was first introduced in India in October, 1959 in which of the following states?
explanation:
It was adopted by state governments during the 1950s and 60s as laws were passed to establish Panchayats in various states. It also found backing in the Indian Constitution, with the 73rd amendment in 1993 to accommodate the idea.
The first state to adopt Panchayat raj system was Rajasthan in nagaur city on the date of 2nd October 1959.
